name: The Embodiment of Despair: Meklord Astro Mekanikle
text: At the beginning of the Duel, add 1 "Meklord Astro Mekanikle", 1 "Meklord Army of Wisel", 1 "Meklord Army of Skiel", and 1 "Meklord Army of Granel" to your Deck. Can be used once per Duel by revealing 1 "Meklord Astro Mekanikle" in your hand. Return 1 "Meklord Army of Wisel", 1 "Meklord Army of Skiel", and 1 "Meklord Army of Granel" from your Graveyard to your hand. After using this Skill, you cannot activate either cards or effects until you successfully Special Summon "Meklord Astro Mekanikle".
